summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley between Blocks 3 and 4, Central Park Addition to West Seattle, being the alley between 44th Avenue Southwest and 45th Avenue Southwest from West Alaska Street to West Edmund Street and certain other alleys, streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 15501 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
